content.title: Welcome to Gamers Den – The Ultimate Vanilla+ ARK Experience
content.text:
Gamers Den offers a balanced ARK experience designed to safe guard your progression while preserving the core survival gameplay that makes ARK rewarding. With moderately boosted rates, enhanced breeding, quality-of-life features and increased structure decay timers, you can be assured that your time committed to ARK is respected and preserved for the long haul!

-=BUILT FOR EVERY PLAYSTYLE=-
Whether you’re a solo player, part of a long-term tribe, or a returning survivor, Gamers Den supports casual and dedicated players alike. PvE is the foundation of the cluster, with optional Tribe War available for players who want consensual PvP without forcing conflict on others.

-=PRIVATELY OWNED • COMMUNITY FOCUSED • NO WIPES=-
Gamers Den is a privately owned and operated server that focuses on long-term stability and redundant safety measures to protect your progress. This is a no-wipe cluster that offers all the core maps plus the most popular ones by the modding community. Whether you’re grinding the old-fashioned way or taking advantage of server quality-of-life features, Gamers Den is built to keep the experience stable, fair, and respectful for everyone.

-=Read the Rules!=-

content.title: Building Rules – Gamers Den
content.text:
All violations are subject to warnings or immediate bans depending on severity.

Base Limit
* Each tribe is allowed 2 bases per map.
* A base is any cluster of structures.
* All structures must be within render distance of each other, 
   including any perimeter walls.
* A third base will be removed without warning.

Open-World Structures 
* Do not spam structures outside your base.
* All taming structures must be removed immediately after use or
  left unlocked for public use.
* Spawn locations must not impact others and are limited to single foundation/bed(s). One per render area - Don’t spam!
* Teleport pads placed outside of your base must be open to public

No Meshing
* No structures or turrets may be placed inside the map mesh.
* Slight(max 50% of structure) terrain clipping for aesthetics is allowed

No Building or Aggressive Dinos in These Areas:
* Artifact Caves
* Obelisks
* Wyvern Nest / Egg Spawn Zones
* Aberration Surface Entrances
* Extinction “Unfobbable” Location (above King Titan Terminal)
* World Borders (no exploiting foundation placement)
* Spawn Zones (no spawn blocking)
* You may build at Extinction OSDs while active, but must remove all structures afterward.

content.title: Game Rules – Gamers Den
content.text:
All violations are subject to warnings or immediate bans depending on severity.

No Hacking or Exploiting
* Abuse of game, mod, or plugin bugs
* Example: Stacking hundreds of vaults inside each other = exploit.

One Character per Player
* Only one character per player per cluster is allowed.
* No second accounts or account sharing.

No Aggression at Spawns/Obelisks
* Do not place aggressive dinos or structures at:
* Player spawn zones or Obelisks

No Meshing or Map Exploits
*Using the map mesh, terrain glitches, or unintended geometry to gain an advantage is strictly prohibited. This includes hiding bases, dinos, structures, or players inside the mesh.

No Insiding
* Stealing from or sabotaging your tribe
* Tribe item replacements will not be issued.
* Choose your tribemates wisely.

No Duping or Cheating
* Duplication, glitching, or any form of cheating

No Scamming
* All trades must be honest and transparent.
* No scamming other players

Dino Stacking Limit
* Max: 2 dinos stacked inside each other.
* Overstacked dinos will be wiped without notice.
* Separate baby dinos once they mature.

Server Performance Responsibility
* Tribes must not cause lag or crashes through structure spam excessive breeding

No Griefing on PvE Servers
* Intentional destruction or killing of other players’ assets on PvE is strictly forbidden.

No Aggressive Dinos on Wander
* Aggressive dinos must be within base walls or “anchored” to a stationary dino at your base.

content.title: World Settings
content.text:
*Structure Decay Timer Increased by 4x (64 days on Metal)
*Dino Decay Timer Increased by 3x (24 days)
*Non-Native Creatures Allowed on Aberration
*Cave Flyers Enabled
*Flyer Speed Leveling Enabled
*Player Movement Speed Leveling Enabled
*Dino Stamina Drain Halved
*Always Allow Structure Pickup
*Resource Respawn Timer Halved
*Increased Weight Capacities
*Boosted Loot Qualities
*XP Multiplier 2x
*Harvest Amount 5x
*Dino Spawn Density 2x
*Item Stack Size 50x
*Platform Saddle Limit 100
*Titanosaur Feeding Enabled

content.title: Taming & Breeding Settings
content.text:
*Taming Speed 10×
*Mature Speed 15x
*Incubation Speed 10x
*Imprint Amount 10x
*Mating intervals increased

content.title: Max Levels
content.text:
*Max Wild Dino Level 150
*Max Tek Dino Level 180
*Max Wyvern Level 190
*Max Shiny Level 180
